solution_line_template: Cameron answered {questions_per_tourist} * {first_group_size} = <<{questions_per_tourist}*{first_group_size}={questions_first_group}>>{questions_first_group} questions for the first group.
He answered {questions_per_tourist} * {second_group_size} = <<{questions_per_tourist}*{second_group_size}={questions_second_group}>>{questions_second_group} questions for the second group.
The third group had {third_group_size} - {inquisitive_tourist_count} = {normal_tourists_third_group} tourists that asked {questions_per_tourist} questions each.

The third group also had {inquisitive_tourist_count} tourist that asked {questions_per_tourist} * {inquisitive_multiplier} = <<{inquisitive_tourist_count}*{questions_per_tourist}*{inquisitive_multiplier}={questions_inquisitive_tourist}>>{questions_inquisitive_tourist} questions.

Thus, the third group asked {normal_tourists_third_group} * {questions_per_tourist} + {questions_inquisitive_tourist} = {normal_tourists_third_group_subtotal} + {questions_inquisitive_tourist} = <<{normal_tourists_third_group}*{questions_per_tourist}+{questions_inquisitive_tourist}={questions_third_group}>>{questions_third_group} questions.

For all four tours, Cameron answered {questions_first_group} + {questions_second_group} + {questions_third_group} + {questions_last_group} = <<{questions_first_group}+{questions_second_group}+{questions_third_group}+{questions_last_group}={total_questions}>>{total_questions} questions.
